briefdescription.para: Level boundary behavior components and systems.

sect1.title: helios::engine::mechanics::bounds
sect1.para: Level boundary behavior components and systems.
This module handles entity behavior when interacting with level boundaries, including bouncing, wrapping, and despawning.

details.para: This namespace contains components and systems for handling entity interactions with level boundaries. It provides configurable behaviors such as bounce, wrap, clamp, and despawn.
